## Basic Info.

-   Name: [al-Idrisi's World Map](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammad_al-Idrisi)

    -   *Tabula Rogeriana*

    -   Nuzhat al-mushtāq fī ikhtirāq al-āfāq

    -   The Excursion of the One Who Yearns to Penetrate the Horizons

    -   The Book of Roger

-   Who: 알이드리시 al-Idrisi (1100 - 1165)

    -   Abu Abdullah Muhammad al-Idrisi al-Qurtubi al-Hasani as-Sabti
    -   Muhammad al-Idrisi
    -   Al-Sharif al-Idrisi

-   When: 1154 (1456 copy)

-   Where: 보들리 도서관 Bodleian Library, Oxford, U.K.

-   Size: 21 x 30 cm [@brotton2014b, 47]
